content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Park Bo-gum

}}
South Korean actor and singer Park Bo-gum () is known for his versatile performances and has been recognized with several awards and nominations across film, television, theater, and entertainment including two Baeksang Arts Awards and a Blue Dragon Series Award.
Park has also been accorded by his home country with several state honors including a Prime Minister's Commendation in 2022 for his active involvement in coal briquette charity, orphanage volunteer work, and comfort women support events – working to further expand his positive influence as a public figure. He is the youngest artist to be named Gallup Korea's Television Actor of the Year and the first and only actor to ever top Forbes Korea Power Celebrity list. He has since been included in Forbes Korea Power Celebrity 40 six times and Gallup Korea's Actor of the Year five times.
